alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Dawson; Furnas; Gosper; Greeley; Phelps; Sherman; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued September 07 at 3:50AM CDT until September 08 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...DANGEROUS FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS POSSIBLE THURSDAY... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR BUFFALO, DAWSON, GOSPER, FURNAS, PHELPS, VALLEY, GREELEY, AND SHERMAN COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL NEBRASKA... The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from late Thursday morning through Thursday evening. * WINDS...South 15 to 25 MPH with gusts up to 35 MPH. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 17 to 22 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that ignite may spread rapidly and exhibit extreme fire behavior. Use extreme caution if engaging in activities that could result in fire ignition. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Buffalo; Dawson; Furnas; Gosper; Greeley; Phelps; Sherman; Valley
